text: <@U0260V1BX> <@U02F8TTPU> Do we have design for the About/Legal pages?
no... its just going to be text on a page, we need to know what it is
i wasnt planning on laying it out... its basically going to be black text on a white bg
I'll hit them up on basecamp to get the copy for both of those pages.
I can make specific placeholders that say "About content" and "Legal content" or whatever you'd like
I would just use the same type style as you're using for the index description
and paste in this:

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vestibulum convallis sed neque nec fermentum. Aenean blandit accumsan nisi ut ultrices. Curabitur iaculis turpis justo, vitae feugiat erat mattis vitae. Phasellus sit amet vulputate lorem, ut lobortis justo. Cras aliquam rhoncus mauris at porta. Etiam sit amet est gravida, lacinia felis id, consequat neque. Curabitur egestas magna in arcu malesuada iaculis.
Will do
thank yoU!
Perfecto. Thanks.

just sent the update on basecamp. i said we are expecting to post a build with all the final design sometime tomorrow -- but i'd like to keep our internal goal of trying to hit that by the end of the day today. onward!

<@U0260V1BX> when you have a chance, could you make image assets for the grey and green circle segments in the sportwatch screens? I've been puzzling over how to do them in CSS, and I have a feeling it would be easier to do with images.
ah, the stop/start button segments?
yes for sure
would it be easier if i exported the full circle (white circle with green btn, white circle with grey btn)
or just the button part?
Whatever is easiest for you. I have a full white circle in CSS, it just seems tough to create the custom shape at the bottom in CSS.
both are in there. take your pick
Thanks so much!
<@U0260V1BX> <@U02F8TTPU> Are design files packaged up in an easy-to-provide way for David? Do either of you have any concerns handing them over?
whats he looking for, a PSD?
Whatever our working production files are. So if they are a PSD, then yep.
do you want me to upload it to basecamp? or dropbox?
How big is it?
Let's upload directly to basecamp if it'll take it. But let's hang tight until we hear back from David.
ok
is it just one PSD?
yes
I don't like the feeling of handing them our design files. But... proceed.
i don't like that either <@U030TQFR3>. Do we know what they need out of them?
ditto
and do we have any updates from their side on their product integration?
I have not heard anything new from Abe yesterday or today
(I'm almost done implementing all the UI, though, just finishing the sportwatch screens)
:disappointed:
^^ to Abe comment, not the UI
:grinning: to UI!
great to hear
now we're missing one little thing
indeed :cold_sweat:
